title: LYFE Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Healthier eating concept restaurant with multiple locations; this one is in the Park Meadows mall. Offers a separate vegan menu with range of choices including flatbreads with vegan cheese, soups, salads, quinoa crunch wrap, Gardein chickn burger, mains like risotto and ravioli, plus desserts. Selection of refreshing beverages made with fruit.
